Rout.desc: outer disk radius; outer radius of the whole structure

epsilon.desc: column density exponent; power index of vert. col.dens.

beta_max.desc: maximum half opening angle of resolved disk; defines the cavity opening angle (here 20 degree)

CHI_ISM.desc: strength of incident vertical UV; UV-field strength (Draine units)

fPAH.desc: PAH abundance with respect to ISM

tol_diskstruc.desc: rel.&abs. tolerance for vertical disk struc

restart.desc: run from restart?; restart from checkpoint file?

radtrans.desc: continuum radiative transfer?; calculate dust continuum RT?

chi_from_RT.desc: calculate chi from UV rad. transfer?

Td_from_RT.desc: calculate dust temp. from rad. transfer?

Jback_from_RT.desc: calculate background Jnu from rad. transfer?

NewChemScan.desc: new initial abund. from down-right scan?

perfect_ice.desc: use long integration time for ices?

write_pop.desc: write output for immediate line transfer?

N_age.desc: no of successive output ages; for more detailed models more steps might be required

PAH_in_RT.desc: are PAH opacities included in rad.trans.?

line_image_side_Npix.desc: line image size fore cube output

line_Nstar.desc: parameters for the line transfer grid

v_turb.desc: turbulent Doppler width; doppler width of UV H2-lines

MCFOST_LIKE.desc: parametric disk structure like in MCFOST?; use Tdust and mu=2.3amu for cT?

MCMAX_LIKE.desc: p = n k Tgas for hydro-structure

Xrays.desc: use Xray chemistry and heating?; switch on X-rays?

Xray_Emin.desc: minimum energy considered as Xray; X-ray min. photon energy

Xray_Temp.desc: X-ray emission temperature; shape of X-ray spectrum

Xray_wlp.desc: optional: number of wl points used for the X-Ray spectrum

Xray_Emax.desc: optional: maximum photon energy to be considered as Xray [keV]

PAH_NC.desc: number of C atoms in PAH

PAH_NH.desc: number of H atoms in PAH

raduc.desc: radius-fac up to where col.dens. increases

write_fits_binary.desc: use fits format for Mie and restart output; use fits-format?

OSU_Alchemic.desc: use the network of the benchmark

chemanalysis.desc: output for rate network analysis; output

settle_method.desc: no dust settling; dust settling (Dubrulle et al. 1995)

chi_logbin.desc: using spectral windows to calc CHI_PHOTO?

endothermic_barrier.desc: no effect on the rates for endo reations

env_Rcavity.desc: "virtual" inner radius of the envelope the inner radius of the domain is given by Rin

env_amax.desc: maximum grain size in the envelope

stop_after_init.desc: use this to just check the model setup

check_network.desc: the osu network fails the checks

CR_induced_UV.desc: use new CR UV field implementation

surface_benchmark.desc: cannot have H2OCO#; use a combination of switches instead

QIndexTotVol.desc: volume of ice available can vary from place to place

write_posDep_opac.desc: write position dependnet opacity output files

H_sticking.desc: not using Hollenbach & Salpeter H sticking

shielding_mc.desc: do not account for self-shielding in mc

STANDfilter.default: " B BS BI G Q R T I A AS AI F D L U RA "
